modName: New book - The Male Organs of Sentient Races
summary:
Adds a short story as a book. Can either replace 'Racial Phylogeny' or be separately added to the game at large.
The story is called "The Male Organs of Sentient Races and Their Properties" by CaveFelem and is from http://archiveofourown.org/chapters/1482095.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a short story as a book either replace 'Racial Phylogeny' or be separately added to the game at large using a small script.
The script means that no patches or compatibility problems should arise, and its technique is heavily based on "Convenient Crossbows"
The story is called "The Male Organs of Sentient Races and Their Properties" by CaveFelem and is from [url=http://archiveofourown.org/chapters/1482095]http://archiveofourown.org/chapters/1482095[/url].

The Summary is as follows:
"Written for the Skyrim Kink Meme prompt which requested a rewrite of the in-game book "Notes on Racial Phylogeny and Biology, Seventh Edition", only about cocks in "long, adoring, lewd detail".

This is what resulted, in an attempt to imitate the style of the in-game books. Note that since this is a rewrite of the abovementioned book, a couple of passages will likely sound familiar."

The book is nearly lore-friendly, except that it refers to the dragonborn in the present tense and there are many British spellings ("colour", etc).

To install it either:
[list]
[*] Use Wrye Bash or NMM and the included wizards will guide you.
[*] Manually copy either the files inside "Separate" or "Replacer" into Skyrim/Data. You could technically copy both, as there are no conflicts, but I would say that it is moronic to have two different copies of the book floating around.
[/list]
author: Delax

files.name: New book - The Male Organs of Sentient Races v1-0 - NMM and Wrye Bash
